scripts.watch: mkdir -p dist && watchify -v -t babelify src/main.js -o dist/Scrawler.js -d
scripts.dist: npm run build:uncompressed && npm run build:compressed
scripts.inst: npm i browser-sync browserify babel-preset-es2015 babelify uglifyify watchify --save-dev
scripts.build:uncompressed: mkdir -p dist && browserify -v -t babelify src/main.js -o dist/Scrawler.js
scripts.build:compressed: mkdir -p dist && browserify -v -t babelify -g uglifyify src/main.js -o dist/Scrawler.min.js --mangle
